attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app trump himself started sending me d1ck pics I was so disgusted that I broke my phone and projectile vomited on my grandma. My vomit came out at such a velocity that it shot a hole right through my grandma NOW I HAVE NO PHONE AND NO GRANDMA 😭 sad.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: this app made my phone lag super bad and i couldn’t even log into snapchat, it kept kicking me out this is horrible please don’t download, it will hack your phone

attributes.title: Not a good app
attributes.review: This app hacked my phone!!! It took three day’s to download and it made my phone crash. Not to mention it’s really slow and freezes all the time!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I was feeding my cat and realized I should probably go on the Donald Trump app. I realized that it is a complete scam and the app is NOT worth downloading. I am completely disappointed and will not be feeding my cat while on this app. It made my cat throw up a hair ball. 😪😪😪

this app was HORRIBLE. not only did it take ages to download, but it asked for permission to use my camera and, like a fool, i said yes. it proceeded to TAKE PICTURES OF ME IN THE SHOWER and UPLOAD THEM TO MY INSTAGRAM. wasn’t even my good side. if i could give no stars i could.
attributes.userName: I'm an angel of the lord

attributes.title: The worst
attributes.review: Right when I opened the app It kept crashing to the point where I couldn’t use it 🤷🏾‍♂️ and I hope no one has to go what I went through. The worst app ever.  #BLM

attributes.title: trump 2020😻😻😻
attributes.review: this app is amazing it gives me very stalker vibes i opened it and my camera turned red which i’ve always enjoyed! it also gives false news abt some guy i don’t remember his name i think it’s the bunny from bambi but i don’t understand anyways, please instead of downloading the app educate urselves on the injustices going on in our country instead of supporting our corrupt govt❤️

attributes.title: Terrible 🤢
attributes.review: This app could not get worse! Wouldn’t download, finally did, but kept crashing when I tried opening it. Wack is what it is. 😑

attributes.title: Don’t download!!hlm🇮🇹

attributes.title: WHAT A TRASH APP
attributes.review: It took 6 YEARS to install, only for it to start counting down from 3 and BLOW UP right next to my goldfish, which caused my uncle to come down to my room and start punishing me 😔 whew anyways, now my cats died all thanks to this app. WHAT A SCAM.
